data.name: Rocket League x Monstercat Vol. 2
data.detailed_description:
The Monstercat / Rocket League team-up has returned with our debut EP for 2018! Featuring a selection of music created specifically for Rocket League by Monstercat Uncaged artists Koven, Stonebank, Pegboard Nerds, Protostar, Slippy, and INTERCOM, Rocket League x Monstercat Vol. 2 is just the first of four original EPs scheduled for release this year.

Track Listing:
1.) Koven - My Love
2.) Stonebank - What Are You Waiting For
3.) Pegboard Nerds - Party Freaks (feat. Anna Yvette)
4.) Slippy - Flow
5.) Protostar - New Horizons
6.) INTERCOM - Truth and Malice

Featuring a selection of music created specifically for Rocket League by Monstercat Uncaged artists Koven, Stonebank, Pegboard Nerds, Protostar, Slippy, and INTERCOM, Rocket League x Monstercat Vol.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4+ GHz Quad core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
